title: Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Talc-Free Mineral Correcting Concealer Trio, Yellow/Light/Pink Trio #7060
description: Mask Dark Circles and BlemishesPhysicians Formula Mineral Wear Talc-Free Mineral Correcting Concealer Trio is an essential 3-in-1 cream concealer that corrects and covers any and all of your imperfections. It's also good when you want to highlight your appearance.•Corrects, covers and highlights•Noncomedogenic•Blends well with skin•Easy to apply•No clumping•Gentle on skin•Allows skin to breatheIt comes in three variations to correct dark circles and bluish imperfections. It also conceals imperfections and illuminates brow bones and temples. It's a minimalist formula that helps reduce irritation and breakout. An applicator is included with this concealer. Use it to cover age spots, discoloration, blemishes and broken capillaries.Just For You:Extra sensitive or breakout-prone skinA Closer Look:Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Talc-Free Mineral Correcting Concealer Trio is a dermatologist approved and hypoallergenic concealer. The light-reflecting pigments optically blur skin imperfections and diffuse the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The concealer's ultra convenient and portable vials snap together and pull apart for easy touch-ups on the go.You Won't Find:Fragrance, paraben or talc

title: Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Talc-Free Mineral Correcting Powder - Natural
description: Physicians Formula: Mineral Wear Correcting Powder, Creamy Natural 0.29 oz. Perfecting blend evens out skin tone. 3-in-1: corrector + primer + powder. In one simple step, this versatile powder color corrects the most common skin imperfections, smoothes skin texture and evens out skin tone. All colors blend together to create a perfect canvas finish: pink brightens, green tones down redness and yellow adds warmth. High-Tech Japanese Formula: High-performance, lightweight texture can be worn alone or layered with other face products. Delivers a natural-looking finish that won't cake, crease or settle into fine lines. The talk on talc: Gentle, talc-free, minimalist formula allows skin to breathe. Can help minimize the risk of irritation and breakout. Mineral Wear for a natural wear: Minerals such as Mica provide a smooth second skin feel and finish.Gently absorbs oil without drying skin and helps minimize the appearance of fine lines. For extra sensitive or breakout-prone skin. Minimalist formula helps reduce irritation and breakout. Hypoallergenic. Fragrance free. Paraben free. Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist approved. Compact contains built-in mirror and includes a high quality brush. Made in Japan.
